= Details =

EXIF Fields used by mapper.pl:
  * Gpslongitude
  * Gpslatitude
  * GPSDateStamp
  * GPSTimeStamp

Formatting of the metatag (lat and long have to be formatted this way):
  * GPSLatitude    : 41 deg 14' 51.00" N
  * GPSLongitude   : 96 deg 0' 57.00" W

The following can be formatted in the way we want them displayed, but no spaces between digits:
  * GPSTimeStamp   : 13:21:32
  * GPS Date Stamp : 2006:03:03
